turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I got to order three pizzas. pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bella Luna the Bella Luna Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and you said large size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I said I didn't actually say anything but I need them in small.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's get one fresh garden style, let's get one meat lovers, and let's get one with pineapple, ground beef, bell peppers, and onions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, bella luna's doesn't have a fresh garden pizza but the veggie lovers might be similar, would you like to order that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have Do they include spinach on the veggie lovers?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, it has spinach.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Alright, you can do that, then.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: They all need to be thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, so you are ordering 3 small pizzas with thick crust, one veggie lovers, one meat lovers, and one with pineapple, bell peppers, onions, and ground beef.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $57, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: well.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh no, I would pay 20 bucks per pizza for a large, though. I know that's worst cost, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: So it's probably a little more expensive just cuz of the cost of living out there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: larges here are $24.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, yeah. You can place the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like pick up, delivery, or dine in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I believe it should be pick-up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes, your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. No, it should be good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, take care.
